products.title: Mirabella Solar Crush Warm Cream Solar/thermal Perfect Fit Pleated Blind
products.description: Their mirabella collection are made from solar fabric. This means they utilize fabric technology that keeps your room warm in winter and cool in summer by absorbing heat from sunlight. This makes them an excellent choice for those who are looking for energy efficient and energy saving blinds. Featured here in their warm cream colour - a contemporary take on a traditional neutral tone.
